http:
  routers:
    hass-router-http:
      rule: Host(`hass.bourne.cloud`)
      service: hass-service
    hass-router-https:
      rule: Host(`hass.bourne.cloud`)
      service: hass-service
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
  services:
    hass-service:
      loadBalancer:
        serversTransport: insecureTransport
        servers:
          - url: "https://192.168.1.16:8123"
  serversTransports:
    insecureTransport:
      insecureSkipVerify: true
